languages.text: {n}Ульфар взрывается яростным ревом, лицо его краснеет.{/n} "Что ты можешь знать о том, каково пребывать воителю Всеотца среди смертных?! Вы — мои боевые товарищи, почти стая мне! Но на вас нет благословения Расса, и для моей крови вы чужаки! Думаешь, мне нравится молчать, когда дело доходит до секретов Волков?! Думаешь, я из той породы скрытных хитрецов, чьи мысли ползают, подобно увертливым гадюкам?! Мне противно это!"

{n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар взрывается яростным ревом, лицо его краснеет.{/n} "Что ты можешь знать о том, каково пребывать воителю Всеотца среди смертных?! Вы — мои боевые товарищи, почти стая мне! Но на вас нет благословения Расса, и для моей крови вы чужаки! Думаешь, мне нравится молчать, когда дело доходит до секретов Волков?! Думаешь, я из той породы скрытных хитрецов, чьи мысли ползают, подобно увертливым гадюкам?! Мне противно это!"

You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive snides whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

languages.text: {n}乌尔法喉咙里发出了一声怒吼，整张脸变得通红。{/n}“你们怎么会明白，全父的战士来到凡人之中究竟是什么感觉？你们都是我的战友，对我而言，你们几乎就是我的狼群！可你们没有得到过鲁斯的祝福，也没有流淌着我们身上流淌的鲜血！你真的以为，我喜欢对狼群的秘密守口如瓶吗？你真的以为，我和那群鬼鬼祟祟的毒蛇是一伙的吗？我可真是要恶心坏了！”
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法喉咙里发出了一声怒吼，整张脸变得通红。{/n}“你们怎么会明白，全父的战士来到凡人之中究竟是什么感觉？你们都是我的战友，对我而言，你们几乎就是我的狼群！可你们没有得到过鲁斯的祝福，也没有流淌着我们身上流淌的鲜血！你真的以为，我喜欢对狼群的秘密守口如瓶吗？你真的以为，我和那群鬼鬼祟祟的毒蛇是一伙的吗？我可真是要恶心坏了！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un violent grognement sort de la gorge d'Ulfar, dont le visage s'empourpre.{/n} « Que savez-vous de la vie d'un guerrier du Père de Tous parmi les mortels ? Vous êtes mes compagnons d'armes, je vous considère presque comme ma meute ! Mais vous n'avez pas la bénédiction de Russ, nous ne sommes pas du même sang ! Vous croyez que je prends plaisir à taire les secrets des Loups ? Vous croyez que je suis comme ces sournois dont les pensées rampent et glissent telles des vipères ? Tout ça me dégoûte ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un violent grognement sort de la gorge d'Ulfar, dont le visage s'empourpre.{/n} « Que savez-vous de la vie d'un guerrier du Père de Tous parmi les mortels ? Vous êtes mes compagnons d'armes, je vous considère presque comme ma meute ! Mais vous n'avez pas la bénédiction de Russ, nous ne sommes pas du même sang ! Vous croyez que je prends plaisir à taire les secrets des Loups ? Vous croyez que je suis comme ces sournois dont les pensées rampent et glissent comme des vipères ? Tout ça me dégoûte ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}顔を真っ赤にしたウルファーの喉から激しい咆哮が沸き起こった。{/n}「全知の父の戦士が人間の中にいることがどういうことか、お前に何がわかる？お前たちは俺の戦友であり、俺にとっては群れの一員のようなものだ！しかしお前はラスの祝福を受けていないし、俺の血族でもない！俺が喜んで狼の秘密について口を閉ざしているとでも？毒蛇のように這いずり回る秘密主義者の血を引いているとでも思っているのか？いい加減にしろ！」
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}顔を真っ赤にしたウルファーの喉から激しい咆哮が沸き起こった。{/n}「全知の父の戦士が人間の中にいることがどういうことか、お前に何がわかる？お前たちは俺の戦友であり、俺にとっては群れの一員のようなものだ！しかしお前はラスの祝福を受けていないし、俺の血族でもない！俺が喜んで狼の秘密について口を閉ざしているとでも？毒蛇のように這いずり回る秘密主義者の血を引いているとでも思っているのか？いい加減にしろ！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un rugido brota de la garganta de Ulfar mientras su rostro se pone colorado.{/n} «¿Qué sabrán ustedes de lo que supone para un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas estar entre mortales? Son mis camaradas de batalla, ¡son casi una manada para mí! Pero no llevan la bendición de Russ; ¡no son de mi sangre! ¿Creen que disfruto callándome los secretos de los Lobos? ¿Piensan que mis hermanos son conspiradores traicioneros cuyos pensamientos se arrastran como víboras? ¡La sola idea me repugna!».
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rugido brota de la garganta de Ulfar mientras su rostro se pone colorado.{/n} «¿Qué sabrán ustedes de lo que supone para un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas estar entre mortales? Son mis camaradas de batalla, ¡son casi una manada para mí! Pero no llevan la bendición de Russ; ¡no son de mi sangre! ¿Creen que disfruto callándome los secretos de los Lobos? ¿Piensan que mi gente son seres despreciables que se arrastran como víboras? ¡La sola idea me repugna!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein wildes Brüllen bricht aus Ulfars Kehle hervor und sein Gesicht färbt sich rot.{/n} "Was wisst Ihr schon darüber, wie es für einen Krieger des Allvaters ist, sich unter Sterblichen zu befinden? Ihr seid meine Kampfkameraden, Ihr seid für mich fast ein Rudel! Doch Ihr habt Russ' Segen nicht, Ihr gehört nicht zu meinem Blut! Glaubt Ihr, es macht mir Spaß, die Geheimnisse der Wolves zu wahren? Glaubt Ihr, ich stamme von geheimniskrämerischen Intriganten ab, deren Gedanken wie Vipern kriechen und sich winden? Es widert mich an!"
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein wildes Brüllen bricht aus Ulfars Kehle hervor und sein Gesicht färbt sich rot.{/n} "Was wisst Ihr schon darüber, wie es für einen Krieger des Allvaters ist, sich unter Sterblichen zu befinden? Ihr seid meine Kampfkameraden, Ihr seid für mich fast ein Rudel! Doch Ihr habt Russ' Segen nicht, Ihr gehört nicht zu meinem Blut! Glaubt Ihr, es macht mir Spaß, die Geheimnisse der Wolves zu wahren? Glaubt Ihr, ich stamme von geheimniskrämerischen Lügnern ab, deren Gedanken wie Vipern kriechen und sich winden? Es widert mich an!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın yüzü kıpkırmızı kesilirken boğazından hiddetli bir hırıltı yükseliyor.{/n} "Yücebaba'nın savaşçılarından birinin, ölümlüler arasında dolanmasının nasıl bir şey olduğunu nereden bilebilirsiniz? Savaş yoldaşımsınız, benim için sürüden hâllicesiniz! Ancak Russ'ın lütfuna sahip değilsiniz, kan sudan ağırdır! Kurtların sırlarını korumak için çenemi tutmaktan hoşnut olduğumu mu sanıyorsunuz? Düşünceleri engerek misali sinsice sürünüp kıvrılan, ağzı sıkı entrikacılardan olduğumu mu düşünüyorsunuz? Bundan iğreniyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}A violent roar erupts from Ulfar's throat as his face turns red.{/n} "What can you know of what it's like for a warrior of the Allfather to be among mortals? You are my battle comrades, you're almost a pack to me! But you do not carry Russ's blessing, you are not of my blood! You think I enjoy keeping my mouth shut about the Wolves' secrets? You think I come from secretive schemers whose thoughts crawl and slither like vipers? It disgusts me!"
